title: JARVIS AI SOFTWARE
description:
What is JARVIS?

Is a system to control your computer utilizing "customizable" voice commands. This new platform can integrate new technologies to interact with Artificial Intelligence (A.I.). By default the systemÃ‚Â´s name is JARVIS.
How can I get it?

The software is free and it searches for new updates automatically, all you need to have is Microsoft Windows 7 or later installed.
What can I control with voice commands?

Internet, mail, weather, clock, alarm, softwares, volume, music, videos, news, ask questions and more.
What if I forgot a command?

You can say show default commands and the system will display a list of commands.
What if I dont want this A.I. to listen to me at some times?

Just say: "Stop listening" and the system will stop for listening until you say: "Come back online".
